help_text.en: A separated child is any person under the age of 18, separated from both parents or from his/her previous legal or customary primary care giver, but not necessarily from other relatives. An unaccompanied child is any person who meets those criteria but is ALSO separated from his/her relatives.

display_name.en: Name(s) given to child after separation?

description.en: Basic identity information about a separated or unaccompanied child.

display_name.en: Other persons well known to the child

help_text.en: If the child does not remember his/her address, please note other relevant information, such as descriptions of mosques, churches, schools and other landmarks.

display_name.en: Address of child before separation (and person with whom he/she lived)
1) Sibling or other child accompanying the child
2) Sibling or other child accompanying the child
3) Sibling or other child accompanying the child

description.en: Information about a child's known family

display_name.en: Does the caregiver know the family of the child?
Caregiver's information about child or family
Child's current address (of caretaker or centre)

description.en: Information about the child's current caregiver
The child's separation and evacuation history.

display_name.en: Person child wishes to locate - Preferred
Person child wishes to locate - Second Choice
Person child wishes to locate - Third Choice
Has the child heard from / been in contact with any relatives?
Does child want to be reunited with family?
Has the child been interviewed by another organization?
Reference No. given to child by other organization

help_text.en: Such as key persons/location in the life of the child who/which might provide information about the location of the sought family -- e.g. names of religious leader, market place, etc. Please ask the child where he/she thinks relatives and siblings might be, and if the child is in contact with any family friends. Include any useful information the caregiver provides.

display_name.en: Additional Info That Could Help In Tracing?
Does Child/Caregiver agree to share name on posters/radio/Internet?
Does Child/Caregiver agree to share collected information with other organizations?
If child does not agree, specify what cannot be shared and why.
Organization in charge of tracing child's family

description.en: All Photo and Audio Files Associated with a Child Record
Details of the enquirer looking for child

display_name.en: If father dead, please provide details
If mother dead please provide details
1) Name of sibling or other child accompanying the child

description.en: Other information to assist in tracing the child
